title: Triplets switching
selftext:
Obligatory trumpgret: Currently living in Florida, voted Trump 2016 because I felt obligated by my “but the economy” GOP family

However, I’m also a triplet and this is the first time we’re all voting Democrat and I’m really excited to see how November shapes out. Been done with Trump’s shit since very early on, voted Dem ticket for governor and Senators, but it really felt good to finally cast a pres vote I can feel good about in a battleground state. Wishing y’all the best in the coming months
